AI Description: Stranded is a bioinformatics tool designed for the analysis of RNA sequencing data. It provides a user-friendly interface for processing and interpreting RNA-seq data to extract meaningful insights.
Core Features: Quality Control Of RNA-Seq Data, Alignment Of Sequence Reads To A Reference Genome, Quantification Of Gene Expression Levels, Differential Gene Expression Analysis, Visualization Of RNA-Seq Results
General Tags: Bioinformatics, RNA Sequencing, Data Analysis, Gene Expression
